title: Blind Dates can be Murder
description: Blind dates give everyone the shivers... with or without a murder attached to them.Jo Tulip is a sassy single woman full of household hints and handy advice for every situation. Her first romantic outing in months is a blind date-okay, the Hall of Fame of Awful Blind Dates-but things go from bad to worse when the date drops dead and Jo finds herself smack in the middle of a murder investigation. With the help of her best friend, Danny, and faith in God, Jo attempts to solve one exciting mystery while facing another: why is love always so complicated?
author: Mindy Starns Clark
